(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (NP (NNS THIS))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ real) (`` ``) (NNP Holy) (NNP Grail) ('' '') (NN experience)))
    (. .)))

cop(experience-10, is-3)
det(experience-10, a-4)

nn(experience-10, Holy-7)
nn(experience-10, Grail-8)
root(ROOT-0, experience-10)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you) (DT all))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBG following)
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS blogs)))))
      (, ,))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB know)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (CD one) (NN thing))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT that))
                (S
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (PP (IN on)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN top))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP
                            (NP (PRP$ my) (NN list))
                            (PP (IN of)
                              (NP (NN food)))))))
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB eat))))))))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP (NNP Kobe) (NN Beef)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (S
        (VP (VBN Granted)))
      (NP (DT this))
      (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
        (NP (NNP Kobe) (NN Beef))))
    (CC but)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP think)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADJP (RB as) (JJ close))
              (SBAR (IN as)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (MD would)
                    (VP (VB get)
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG eating)
                            (NP
                              (NP (NNP Kobe) (NNP Beef))
                              (PP (IN in)
                                (NP (NNP Singapore))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

        (S
          (S
            (VP
              (VP (VBG eating)

                        (NP (NN fat))))))

        (PP (DT all) (IN by)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP yourself))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN course)))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(eat-3, You-1)
aux(eat-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, eat-3)
dobj(eat-3, it-4)
dep(by-6, all-5)
prep(eat-3, by-6)
pobj(by-6, yourself-7)
prep(yourself-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, course-9)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (JJS best))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB share)
                  (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (NN steak))
                  (PP (IN with)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS friends))))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(think-3, but-1)
nsubj(think-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, think-3)
nsubj(best-6, it-4)
cop(best-6, is-5)
ccomp(think-3, best-6)
aux(share-8, to-7)
xcomp(best-6, share-8)
predet(steak-11, such-9)
det(steak-11, a-10)
dobj(share-8, steak-11)
prep(share-8, with-12)
det(friends-15, a-13)
amod(friends-15, few-14)
pobj(with-12, friends-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBG doing)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS friends))
            (CC and)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ your) (NN body))
              (NP (DT a) (JJ big) (NN favor)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(doing-4, You-1)
aux(doing-4, will-2)
aux(doing-4, be-3)
root(ROOT-0, doing-4)
poss(friends-6, your-5)
dobj(doing-4, friends-6)
cc(friends-6, and-7)
poss(body-9, your-8)
conj(friends-6, body-9)
det(favor-12, a-10)
amod(favor-12, big-11)
dep(body-9, favor-12)
